评论概述: Waste of money! Do not believe the size!!!
评论详情: I am a XL, but knew these dresses from Asia are not sized accurately. I purchased a 3XL, which should have been fine. I pulled them out for my daughter's sweet 16 party and it was equivalent to a Large at most, maybe even smaller. I trusted it would be fine, but absolutely should have tried them on...instead of trusting a store selling on Amazon. I a wore a size 14 dress that night, with is the size of an XL in America. For a store to be allowed to be so deceptive on Amazon, is ludicrous and feels like theft.
